name: Unique and the Potato Thief
description:
OH NO! BowserJ, the infamous potato-thief has made a global-takeover and stole all the potatoes! Unique, the immortal girl from the USA has already decided to fight against him. Together with Amoc, she is on her way to defeat him. After BowserJ heard the news, he made clones of bm, the potato protector he captured and send them to defeat Amique. But Unique isn't just immortal. She has special abilities and she is going to use them. So, what are you waiting for? Restore the balance in the world and defeat JJ!

Made by BowserJ:

BOWSERJ (@BowserJDev) / Twitter

BowserJ Dev - YouTube

With help from AMoC, bm and MrSteve:

AMoC Tirugamo - YouTube

not available (@BMstudios6) / Twitter

MrSteveHD - YouTube

This game was made for TheUnique1's birthday (10th of may) in only two days. 

TheUnique1 - YouTube

TheUnique1 (COMMISSIONS OPEN) (@TheUnique113) / Twitter
